title: Discriminant
text: To find the discriminant, of a quadratic equation, we calculate $$b^2-4ac$$. If that value is greater than 0 it has 2 real solutions, if it is smaller than 0 it has no real solutions, and if it is equal to 0 it has 1 real solution.

title: Discriminant
text: In this case, what is our discriminant?

title: Discriminant
text: Since this value is less than 0, is this equation's solutions real or not real?
